title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2013 Casascius 1BTC S3 "1Ag1wXk9", silver 1oz MS67 PLLOT 2: 2011 Casascius 1BTC S1 "1FNRbhQ6", brass 6.8g MS67 "ERROR COIN"LOT 3: 2013 Casascius 0.1BTC S3"1Agxg8K4", silver 7.5g MS68 PLSTARTING BID PER LOT: FACE VALUE IN BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: JUNE 30th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
